Articles.Content:
Yes, this is just a thread, like any others in this forum.

It's also the thread where I will post stuff that are supposed to be in any other sub-forums, cause having a whole forum with a bunch of sub-forums is just not enough.

Hi Daniel345,

Threads like this are needless, and clog up the forum. Please don't make posts like this again, as many users find them annoying.

Locked. PM me with any queries. Have a nice day.
